name: ECS task definitions should not share the host's process namespace
query:
{
  ecsTaskDefinitions(where:  {pidMode_MATCHES: "host", task_NOT: null}) {
    identifier
    accountID
    cloudAccountID
    cloudAccountName
    cloudProvider
    idFromProvider
    internalAssetType
    internalName
    internalRegion
    assetCategory
    contentHash
  }
}
